message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price, considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our negotiation,  $1,350,000 is still below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. This offer is still fair, considering the value the product holds for you.  I hope we can reach an agreement.

I understand your position, Alice. I've carefully considered our negotiation thus far. I would like to propose an offer of $1,400,000 for the product. This is my final offer, as it aligns closely with the value I place on the item while also staying within my budget constraints.
